Title.Language: A Prayer Said By The Bishop Silently On Himself Before Every Consecration

Text.Language: Marentwbh m~P[oic Vnou] Pipantokratwr Viwt m~Pen[oic ouoh Pennou] ouoh Pencwt/r I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
Let us entreat the Lord, God, the Pantocrator, the Father of our Lord, God, and Savior Jesus Christâ€”

Anok pekbwk (...) p~s/ri n~nia~poctoloc: eie~hiwis qen ]oikoumen/ m~v~r/] n~naio] t/rou: e~pitaio e~p~jini~ e~q~r/i m~pekmonogen/c n~S/ri I/couc Pi,~rictoc e~pikocmoc: nem Pef[icarx e~bol qen ]paryenoc eyouab ]a~gia Maria: nem Piref]wmc n~oujai: nem nim~kauh n~reftanqo e~tafsopou qen pefouws e~h~r/i e~jwn hijen Pic~tauroc: nem Tefa~nactacic eyouab.

I, Your servant (...), son of the apostles and preacher in the world like all my fathers, with the honor of the Coming of Your only-begotten Son, Jesus Christ into the world, and His Incarnation of the Virgin Saint Mary, and the Baptism of salvation, and His life-giving passion on the Cross which He accepted willingly for us, and His holy Resurrection.

Yai te teno~mologia n~te Pef,~rictoc: nem pentajro n~te pinah] etcoutwn e~tan[itc e~bol hiten naio] t/rou.
This is our confession in His Christ, and our confirmation in the orthodox faith which we have received from all our fathers.
Ù‡Ø°Ø§ Ù‡Ùˆ Ø¥Ø¹ØªØ±Ø§Ù?Ù†Ø§ Ø¨Ù…Ø³ÙŠØ­Ù‡ØŒ ÙˆØ«Ø¨Ø§ØªÙ†Ø§ Ù?ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø¥ÙŠÙ…Ø§Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ØªÙ‚ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø°ÙŠ Ø£Ø®Ø°Ù†Ø§Ù‡ Ø¹Ù† Ø¬Ù…ÙŠØ¹ Ø£Ø¨Ø§Ø¦Ù†Ø§.
Anok qa pijwb n~refernobi (...): jws e~q~r/i e~jwi n~]m/tc~nau n~a~ret/ n~te tekmet,~r/ctoc.
I, the weak and sinful (...), [ask that You] pour upon me the twelve virtues of Your goodness.
Ø£Ù†Ø§ Ù‡Ùˆ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ø¬Ø² Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø§Ø·Ø¦ (...)ØŒ Ø£Ù?Ø¶ Ø¹Ù„ÙŠÙ‘ÙŽ Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø«Ù†Ù‰ Ø¹Ø´Ø± Ù?Ø¶ÙŠÙ„Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ Ù„ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­Ùƒ.

E~maht n~ka] niben nem covia niben nem metsenh/t: e~p~jincwouten n~tajij n~oui~nam e~jen pekbwk (...) n~taenf e~qoun e~piywhem n~a~poctolikon nem pibaymoc n~lutorgion e~keopt nemaf e~pik~l/roc n~te n/eyouab n~tak qen Pi,~rictoc I/couc Pen[oic.

Fill me with every understanding, every wisdom, and compassion, to place my right-hand upon Your servant (...) whom I am calling for the mission, the service, and the priesthood. Count me, with him, for the inheritance [reserved] for Your saints, in Christ Jesus our Lord.

Vai e~te e~bol hitotf e~re piw~ou nem pitaio nem pia~mahi nem ]p~rockun/cic: erp~repi nak nemaf: nem Pip~neuma eyouab n~reftanqo ouoh n~o~mooucioc nemak.
Through whom the glory, the honor, the dominion, and the worship are due unto You, with Him and the Holy Spirit, the Giver of Life, who is of one essence with You,

}nou nem n~c/ou niben nem sa e~neh n~te nie~neh t/rou: a~m/n.
now and at all times, and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
